title: MontPythonn
author: MontPythonn
content: I am doing a big scale investigation with some teams and at this point on management/compliance or any other topic 1xbet is not affiliated directly with 1xbit at all in any way.Prove me wrong, show me blockchain linksNote, I do not say they are legit/scams/nor I care or give a shit, so fuck off people who say it is a scam, I will report your posts, I am interested in comments only about links between companies or people who find proof! I want to know if I missed something

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: MontPythonn on September 02, 2023, 05:36:13 PMI am doing a big scale investigation with some teams and at this point on management/compliance or any other topic 1xbet is not affiliated directly with 1xbit at all in any way.We got a pretty clear admission from their representative that they are related, at least in some way.Quote from: 1xBit.com on November 17, 2016, 02:32:55 PMWe are related. Its obvious))We are using a lot of 1xbet.com functions, 1xbet using some ours.But our team is separate and we'll develop a lot of new features soon.Quote from: 1xBit.com on November 16, 2016, 11:56:40 AMWe are not the same but still use a lot of 1xbet options including customer support.Why would they claim to be related and use the same departments, like customer support, and some other functions if they are not?Quote from: MontPythonn on September 02, 2023, 05:36:13 PMProve me wrong, show me blockchain linksI posted this in a similar discussion last year.Furthermore, you should check out hellocrex's in-depth research on the link between the Crex24 scam exchange and the 1xBET/1xBit group: Crex24.com = 1xBet = 1xBit. Owners of fraudful exchange have been de-anonimyzed

comments.author: MontPythonn
comments.body: NOT INTERESTED IF SCAM OR NOT!INTERESTED IN BLOCKCHAIN LINKS BETWEEN THEM!NOT INTERESTED IF SAME FOUNDER. INTERESTED IN BLOCKCHAIN LINKS, IS THIS A BITCOIN FORUM OR THE NEW FACEBOOK GRANDMA GROUP?@decodx only post i will keep in this thread that is not a spammer ->> https://teletype.in/@hjre4z0/crex24-en this guy is cool made good osint search, too much speculation, but not what i am looking forplease be serious while you reply, i will say again this is not topic if they scam or the same owners or any other bullshit ugly moms talking, this is blockchain links related
